title.rendered: Bluetooth Earpiece for Cell Phone, Timmkoo S60 Single Ear Hands-Free Wireless Bluetooth Headset with Mic Apt-X CVC8.0…

content.rendered:
.aplus-tech-spec-hide-loading { visibility: seen !essential; }

Bluetooth Version 5.0
Support Protocol HSP/HFP/A2DP/AVRCP
Support Decoding SBC/AAC/Apt-X
Frequency 2.4GHz ~ 2.48GHz
Transmission Range 33 – 50 ft
Battery Capacity 230mAh
Music Time / Call Time 46 hours (50% quantity)
Charge Time 2 hours

Qualcomm QCC3020 Chip

Timmkoo S60 Bluetooth headset is provided with Qualcomm 3020 chip, which makes the machine have extra environment friendly data processing functionality, sooner response and extra steady sign transmission.

Apt-X – Lossless audio

QCC chip’s Apt-X audio decoding expertise has the benefits of low latency and excessive sound high quality in audio processing. So this wi-fi Bluetooth headphone can present you with good music enjoyment, and make sure that there isn’t any delay, no static and noise throughout your name, it is identical to face-face speaking.

CVC 8.0 Noise Cancellation

Timkkoo S60 Bluetooth wi-fi headset with CVC8.0 expertise can successfully eradicate the ambient noise round you throughout your name and precisely choose up your voice. So that the one who solutions the cellphone can hear what you say very clearly, even in case you are in a loud place similar to subway, bus station, airport, avenue, and many others.

46 hours play & discuss time

Get 46 hours of play & discuss time and 460 hours of standby time on a single cost. With this wi-fi headphone, you are able to do a marathon discuss on the cellphone with your lover or household, additionally take pleasure in your stream music all through the day.

IPX 6 Waterproof

The software of MPVCD nano coating expertise makes this cellphone headset have good sweatproof and waterproof efficiency. Even when you take them to outside sports activities, or put on them when it rains, it may possibly carry you an excellent sense of safety.

Comfortable to put on

The software of MPVCD nano coating expertise makes this cellphone headset have good sweatproof and waterproof efficiency. Even when you take them to outside sports activities, or put on them when it rains, it may possibly carry you an excellent sense of safety.

Read more

Wearable on each ears

Timmkoo S60 single bluetooth headset gives a 180 diploma rotatable earbud to suit your left or proper ear. This satisfies folks with completely different ear habits. You can swap between the left and proper ears with a easy adjustment.

Easy to Use

To simplify your use, this mobile phone headset integrates all capabilities in a single button, together with on/off, play/pause/subsequent observe, reply/reject/hold up, voice assistant, and many others. You can freely management your calls and music taking part in.

Widely Compatible

The wi-fi headset may be paired with two Bluetooth units concurrently. It helps nearly all Bluetooth units, similar to laptops, tablets, sensible telephones, pc, TVs, PC. Compatible with iPad, iPod, iPhone, Samsung, LG, HuaWei, Motorola and different android cellphones.

Read more

For driving

For truck drivers and self-driving fans who must drive for a very long time, Timmkoo S60 bluetooth earpiece permit to you have got a relaxed and nice driving.:

· When you have to reply the cellphone throughout your driving, it may possibly launch your arms nicely, so that you could deal with driving safely.

· When you’re feeling bored, you possibly can benefit from the music with one ear, liberate one other ear to concentrate to attainable emergencies.

For sports activities

Whether it’s indoor sports activities, similar to health, yoga, or outside sports activities, similar to working, mountain climbing, biking, climbing, and many others., this wi-fi eariece can provide you an excellent music enjoyment and clear name in progress.

For workplace

For those that typically want on-line voice or video convention, similar to enterprise folks, name facilities,and many others, a transparent and stable-connection single Bluetooth headset can guarantee the sleek progress and effectiveness of the convention / communication. Timmkoo S60 can be a sensible choice for you.

For outside work

For those that work open air for a very long time, similar to couriers, supply man, journalists, and many others. This wi-fi headset may enormously assist them.

It may be appropriate with most Bluetooth units, together with cellphones (IOS, andriod), pill, laptop computer, TV, and many others.
CLEAR & SMOOTH CALLING: Thanks to the CVC8.0 and Apt-X expertise, The Bluetooth earpiece can enormously filter and scale back ambient noise, offering you with a tremendous noise cancelling expertise and clearer calls, whether or not you might be on a freeway Driving or working within the workplace.
ULTRA-LONG BATTERY LIFE: The mixed software of QCC3020 chip and low-power resolution permits S60 wi-fi headset to have as much as 46 hours of steady playtime and 460 hours of standby time with single cost. and it takes lower than 2 hours to completely cost.
IPX6 WATERPROOF: MPVCD nano-coating expertise used within the wi-fi earpiece can successfully keep away from the harm brought on by moisture, sweat and liquid splashing. So You can use it in sweaty gyms and office with none concern.
COMFORTABLE TO WEAR & EASY TO USE: TIMMKOO S60 single Bluetooth earpiece have a extra ergonomic form construction, a liquid silicone materials ear hooks and a reminiscence foam eartips, and many others. All of those are designed to make sure that you have got a snug and steady sporting, even for a very long time.
